page.title: 15SHOPPING IN TADLEY
page.content: One of the commonest complaints about Tadley is its paucity of shopping facilities. There is a garden centre, a DIY shop and two small supermarkets. Specialist shops include: chemist, woolshop, florist, small electrical shops, butcher, baker and video centre. Most people questioned said that they usually shop in Basingstoke, Newbury or at the Hypermarket at Theale. They felt that a defined shopping precinct with a good range of shops was an urgently needed improve- ment. There are also a limited range of services such as banks, estate agents, hair dressers, builders and decorators etc, plus some makers of electronic equipment, and there are demands for more choice as well as a bigger range of shops. A new shopping area is planned, but whether it will satisfy demand remains to be seen.
